entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle early this evening. 70 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High 11.
entry.summary: Rain ending late in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Amount 10 to 15 mm. High 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers in the evening and after midnight. A few showers beginning after midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
